replies.bodyText: Dynamic configuration will not modify TraceServiceModuleConfig#sampleRate，but modify TraceSampleRateWatcher#sampleRate
replies.author: killGC

replies.bodyText: No one will change this reference, @killGC
replies.author: wu-sheng

replies.bodyText: okay，but this reference #traceSampleRateWatcher#sampleRate will change，to get newest sampleRate's value by this reference，no need for this reference add volatile？
replies.author: killGC

replies.bodyText: You are always using the same config#getTraceSampleRateWatcher  reference, right? As the config is never changed, you don't need this. volatile could cause more CPU, please use it if necessary.
replies.author: wu-sheng

replies.bodyText: okay,i see
replies.author: killGC

timeline.bodyText: Why config has reference to watcher? This is strange. Watcher should be a part of TraceSegmentSampler
timeline.author: wu-sheng

replies.bodyText: Config should only be changed through the initialization stage. Nothing more.
